info.title: Product Requirements Management API
info.description:
Comprehensive API for managing product requirements through hierarchical structure of Epics  User Stories  Requirements. 
Features include full-text search, comment system, relationship mapping, and configurable workflows.

author_id.description: UUID of the user who created the comment

content.description: The text content of the comment
content.example: This requirement needs clarification on the user authentication flow.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the comment was created

entity_id.description: UUID of the entity this comment is attached to

entity_type.description: Type of entity this comment is attached to

is_resolved.description: Whether the comment has been resolved

linked_text.description: Text that this inline comment is linked to (for inline comments only)

parent_comment_id.description: UUID of the parent comment if this is a reply

replies.description: Array of reply comments (populated when include=replies)

text_position_end.description: End position of the linked text (for inline comments only)

text_position_start.description: Start position of the linked text (for inline comments only)

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the comment was last updated

content.description: The text content of the comment
content.example: This requirement needs clarification on the user authentication flow.

parent_comment_id.description: UUID of the parent comment if creating a reply (optional)

content.description: The text content of the inline comment

linked_text.description: The exact text that this comment is linked to

text_position_end.description: End character position of the linked text in the entity content

text_position_start.description: Start character position of the linked text in the entity content

reference_id.description: Human-readable reference ID of the deleted entity

deleted_entities.description: List of entities that were deleted

message.description: Human-readable message about the deletion result

success.description: Whether the deletion operation was successful

can_delete.description: Whether the entity can be safely deleted

dependencies.description: List of entities that depend on this entity

reference_id.description: Human-readable reference ID of the dependent entity

Epic.description: High-level feature or initiative containing multiple user stories

ErrorResponse.description: Standard error response with code and message

comment_id.description: UUID of the inline comment to validate

text_position_end.description: End character position of the comment in the entity content

text_position_start.description: Start character position of the comment in the entity content

comments.description: List of inline comment positions to validate against current entity content
